The articles were shared by social media: indicating widespread attention and interest in the claim.
The original article from The Siberian T: which many misleading articles sourced their claims from, described the incident in detail, including the man being preserved as 'tin-can' food by a brown bear.
Reverse image and keyword searches revea: specifically in a report by Russian language news agency EurAsia Daily.
EurAsia Daily published a second report: but they had received the video from a well-known businessman in Tuva who claimed to have received the information from eyewitnesses present at the incident.
